item.title: By: Justin Dearing
item.dc:creator: Justin Dearing
item.description: I find the concept intriguing. However, I'd be concerned about the security implications of this. You open up more possibilities for damage if someone finds an injection path to your db.
item.content:encoded: I find the concept intriguing. However, I’d be concerned about the security implications of this. You open up more possibilities for damage if someone finds an injection path to your db.
